public method Parser::Context::Constants::create (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in create: 5
sub create {
  my $self = shift; my $value = shift;
  return $value if ref($value) eq 'HASH';
  return {value => $value, keepName => 1};
}
public method Parser::Context::Constants::init (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in init: 8
sub init {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->{dataName} = 'constants';
  $self->{name} = 'constant';
  $self->{Name} = 'Constant';
  $self->{namePattern} = qr/[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*|_blank_/;
  $self->{tokenType} = 'const';
}

sub uncreate {shift; (shift)->{value}}
public method Parser::Context::Constants::value (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in value: 4
sub value {
  my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
  return $self->{context}{constants}{$x}{value};
}
